Html:
Hello, I'm jewlercrafter, and when I try to use the optimizer to see if there are a better combination of gems, I get a result always worse than mine.

I notice that it doesn't use any jewlercrafting gem. Is this a bug or I'm doing something wrong?

Thnaks.
You're probably just not marking them as available for optimizing.  Check out http://rawr.codeplex.com/Wiki/View.aspx?title=GearOptimization for more info.
I marked them as available for optimizing. But the optimizer don't use them.
If you're sure you're marking them as available you'll have to attach your character xml in a new issue and describe exactly what you're doing so we can replicate.
